[Chorus]
Katarenai nemurenai toroimerai
Anata no miteru shoutai
Daremo yomenai karute
Fukashigi shiritai dake

[Verse 1]
Uso mo genjitsu mo
Docchi mo shinjitsu datta no hontou yo
Kyou mo hitorigoto
Nannimo muri wo shinaide watashi aisaretai
[Chorus]
Uyamuya sayonara karui memai
Anata no inai genshoukai
Daremo yomenai karute
Jiishiki afuredashite

[Piano solo]

[Verse 2]
Kodou wo sekaizou wo
Itsumo kami awanai no itakute
Maiyo negaigoto
Nannimo utagawanaide mazari toke aitai

[Chorus]
Tawainai wakaranai riyuu sonzai
Anata to nokosu koukai
Daremo yomenai karute
Fuyukai kurikaeshite

[Piano Solo]

[Bridge]
Tadashii yume wa kanashii koe wa
Utsukushii? utagawashii? urayamashii?
Nee, dore?

[Chorus]
Katarenai nemurenai toroimerai
Anata no miteru shoutai
Daremo yomenai karute
Fukashigi shiritai dake
Owaranai koto wa nai toroimerai
Anata to matagu kyoukai
Daremo yomenai karute
Shishunki kizuguchi mune no uchi
Fukashigi shiritai dake

Docchi mo shinjitsu datta no hontou yo
Kyou mo hitorigoto
Nannimo muri wo shinaide watashi aisaretai
[Chorus]
Uyamuya sayonara karui memai
Anata no inai genshoukai
Daremo yomenai karute
Jiishiki afuredashite

[Piano solo]

[Verse 2]
Kodou wo sekaizou wo
Itsumo kami awanai no itakute
Maiyo negaigoto
Nannimo utagawanaide mazari toke aitai

[Chorus]
Tawainai wakaranai riyuu sonzai
Anata to nokosu koukai
Daremo yomenai karute
Fuyukai kurikaeshite

[Piano Solo]

[Bridge]
Tadashii yume wa kanashii koe wa
Utsukushii? utagawashii? urayamashii?
Nee, dore?

[Chorus]
Katarenai nemurenai toroimerai
Anata no miteru shoutai
Daremo yomenai karute
Fukashigi shiritai dake
Owaranai koto wa nai toroimerai
Anata to matagu kyoukai
Daremo yomenai karute
Shishunki kizuguchi mune no uchi
Fukashigi shiritai dake

Uyamuya sayonara karui memai
Anata no inai genshoukai
Daremo yomenai karute
Jiishiki afuredashite

[Piano solo]

[Verse 2]
Kodou wo sekaizou wo
Itsumo kami awanai no itakute
Maiyo negaigoto
Nannimo utagawanaide mazari toke aitai

[Chorus]
Tawainai wakaranai riyuu sonzai
Anata to nokosu koukai
Daremo yomenai karute
Fuyukai kurikaeshite

[Piano Solo]

[Bridge]
Tadashii yume wa kanashii koe wa
Utsukushii? utagawashii? urayamashii?
Nee, dore?

[Chorus]
Katarenai nemurenai toroimerai
Anata no miteru shoutai
Daremo yomenai karute
Fukashigi shiritai dake
Owaranai koto wa nai toroimerai
Anata to matagu kyoukai
Daremo yomenai karute
Shishunki kizuguchi mune no uchi
Fukashigi shiritai dake

[Piano solo]

[Verse 2]
Kodou wo sekaizou wo
Itsumo kami awanai no itakute
Maiyo negaigoto
Nannimo utagawanaide mazari toke aitai

[Chorus]
Tawainai wakaranai riyuu sonzai
Anata to nokosu koukai
Daremo yomenai karute
Fuyukai kurikaeshite

[Piano Solo]

[Bridge]
Tadashii yume wa kanashii koe wa
Utsukushii? utagawashii? urayamashii?
Nee, dore?

[Chorus]
Katarenai nemurenai toroimerai
Anata no miteru shoutai
Daremo yomenai karute
Fukashigi shiritai dake
Owaranai koto wa nai toroimerai
Anata to matagu kyoukai
Daremo yomenai karute
Shishunki kizuguchi mune no uchi
Fukashigi shiritai dake

[Chorus]

Anata no miteru shoutai
Daremo yomenai karute
Fukashigi shiritai dake

[Verse 1]

Nannimo muri wo shinaide watashi aisaretai
[Chorus]
Uyamuya sayonara karui memai
Anata no inai genshoukai

Nannimo utagawanaide mazari toke aitai

[Chorus]
Tawainai wakaranai riyuu sonzai
Anata to nokosu koukai
Daremo yomenai karute
Fuyukai kurikaeshite

[Piano Solo]

[Bridge]
Tadashii yume wa kanashii koe wa
Utsukushii? utagawashii? urayamashii?
Nee, dore?

[Chorus]
Katarenai nemurenai toroimerai
Anata no miteru shoutai
Daremo yomenai karute
Fukashigi shiritai dake
Owaranai koto wa nai toroimerai
Anata to matagu kyoukai
Daremo yomenai karute
Shishunki kizuguchi mune no uchi
Fukashigi shiritai dake

[Chorus]
Katarenai nemurenai toroimerai
Anata no miteru shoutai
Daremo yomenai karute
Fukashigi shiritai dake

[Verse 1]
Uso mo genjitsu mo
Docchi mo shinjitsu datta no hontou yo
Kyou mo hitorigoto
Nannimo muri wo shinaide watashi aisaretai
[Chorus]
Uyamuya sayonara karui memai
Anata no inai genshoukai
Daremo yomenai karute
Jiishiki afuredashite

[Piano solo]

[Verse 2]

Anata to nokosu koukai
Daremo yomenai karute
Fuyukai kurikaeshite

[Piano Solo]

[Bridge]
Tadashii yume wa kanashii koe wa
Utsukushii? utagawashii? urayamashii?
Nee, dore?

[Chorus]
Katarenai nemurenai toroimerai
Anata no miteru shoutai
Daremo yomenai karute
Fukashigi shiritai dake
Owaranai koto wa nai toroimerai
Anata to matagu kyoukai
Daremo yomenai karute
Shishunki kizuguchi mune no uchi
Fukashigi shiritai dake

[Chorus]
Katarenai nemurenai toroimerai
Anata no miteru shoutai
Daremo yomenai karute
Fukashigi shiritai dake

[Verse 1]
Uso mo genjitsu mo
Docchi mo shinjitsu datta no hontou yo
Kyou mo hitorigoto
Nannimo muri wo shinaide watashi aisaretai
[Chorus]
Uyamuya sayonara karui memai
Anata no inai genshoukai
Daremo yomenai karute
Jiishiki afuredashite

[Piano solo]

[Verse 2]
Kodou wo sekaizou wo
Itsumo kami awanai no itakute
Maiyo negaigoto
Nannimo utagawanaide mazari toke aitai

Tadashii yume wa kanashii koe wa
Utsukushii? utagawashii? urayamashii?
Nee, dore?

[Chorus]
Katarenai nemurenai toroimerai
Anata no miteru shoutai
Daremo yomenai karute
Fukashigi shiritai dake
Owaranai koto wa nai toroimerai
Anata to matagu kyoukai
Daremo yomenai karute
Shishunki kizuguchi mune no uchi
Fukashigi shiritai dake

[Chorus]
Katarenai nemurenai toroimerai
Anata no miteru shoutai
Daremo yomenai karute
Fukashigi shiritai dake

[Verse 1]
Uso mo genjitsu mo
Docchi mo shinjitsu datta no hontou yo
Kyou mo hitorigoto
Nannimo muri wo shinaide watashi aisaretai
[Chorus]
Uyamuya sayonara karui memai
Anata no inai genshoukai
Daremo yomenai karute
Jiishiki afuredashite

[Piano solo]

[Verse 2]
Kodou wo sekaizou wo
Itsumo kami awanai no itakute
Maiyo negaigoto
Nannimo utagawanaide mazari toke aitai

[Chorus]
Tawainai wakaranai riyuu sonzai
Anata to nokosu koukai
Daremo yomenai karute
Fuyukai kurikaeshite

Katarenai nemurenai toroimerai
Anata no miteru shoutai
Daremo yomenai karute
Fukashigi shiritai dake
Owaranai koto wa nai toroimerai
Anata to matagu kyoukai
Daremo yomenai karute
Shishunki kizuguchi mune no uchi
Fukashigi shiritai dake

[Chorus]
Katarenai nemurenai toroimerai
Anata no miteru shoutai
Daremo yomenai karute
Fukashigi shiritai dake

[Verse 1]
Uso mo genjitsu mo
Docchi mo shinjitsu datta no hontou yo
Kyou mo hitorigoto
Nannimo muri wo shinaide watashi aisaretai
[Chorus]
Uyamuya sayonara karui memai
Anata no inai genshoukai
Daremo yomenai karute
Jiishiki afuredashite

[Piano solo]

[Verse 2]
Kodou wo sekaizou wo
Itsumo kami awanai no itakute
Maiyo negaigoto
Nannimo utagawanaide mazari toke aitai

[Chorus]
Tawainai wakaranai riyuu sonzai
Anata to nokosu koukai
Daremo yomenai karute
Fuyukai kurikaeshite

[Piano Solo]

[Bridge]
Tadashii yume wa kanashii koe wa
Utsukushii? utagawashii? urayamashii?
Nee, dore?

Owaranai koto wa nai toroimerai
Anata to matagu kyoukai
Daremo yomenai karute
Shishunki kizuguchi mune no uchi
Fukashigi shiritai dake

[Chorus]
Katarenai nemurenai toroimerai
Anata no miteru shoutai
Daremo yomenai karute
Fukashigi shiritai dake

[Verse 1]
Uso mo genjitsu mo
Docchi mo shinjitsu datta no hontou yo
Kyou mo hitorigoto
Nannimo muri wo shinaide watashi aisaretai
[Chorus]
Uyamuya sayonara karui memai
Anata no inai genshoukai
Daremo yomenai karute
Jiishiki afuredashite

[Piano solo]

[Verse 2]
Kodou wo sekaizou wo
Itsumo kami awanai no itakute
Maiyo negaigoto
Nannimo utagawanaide mazari toke aitai

[Chorus]
Tawainai wakaranai riyuu sonzai
Anata to nokosu koukai
Daremo yomenai karute
Fuyukai kurikaeshite

[Piano Solo]

[Bridge]
Tadashii yume wa kanashii koe wa
Utsukushii? utagawashii? urayamashii?
Nee, dore?

Fukashigi shiritai dake

[Chorus]
Katarenai nemurenai toroimerai
Anata no miteru shoutai
Daremo yomenai karute
Fukashigi shiritai dake

[Verse 1]
Uso mo genjitsu mo
Docchi mo shinjitsu datta no hontou yo
Kyou mo hitorigoto
Nannimo muri wo shinaide watashi aisaretai
[Chorus]
Uyamuya sayonara karui memai
Anata no inai genshoukai
Daremo yomenai karute
Jiishiki afuredashite

[Piano solo]

[Verse 2]
Kodou wo sekaizou wo
Itsumo kami awanai no itakute
Maiyo negaigoto
Nannimo utagawanaide mazari toke aitai

[Chorus]
Tawainai wakaranai riyuu sonzai
Anata to nokosu koukai
Daremo yomenai karute
Fuyukai kurikaeshite

[Piano Solo]

[Bridge]
Tadashii yume wa kanashii koe wa
Utsukushii? utagawashii? urayamashii?
Nee, dore?

Daremo yomenai karute
Fukashigi shiritai dake

[Verse 1]
Uso mo genjitsu mo
Docchi mo shinjitsu datta no hontou yo
Kyou mo hitorigoto
Nannimo muri wo shinaide watashi aisaretai
[Chorus]
Uyamuya sayonara karui memai
Anata no inai genshoukai
Daremo yomenai karute
Jiishiki afuredashite

[Piano solo]

[Verse 2]
Kodou wo sekaizou wo
Itsumo kami awanai no itakute
Maiyo negaigoto
Nannimo utagawanaide mazari toke aitai

[Chorus]
Tawainai wakaranai riyuu sonzai
Anata to nokosu koukai
Daremo yomenai karute
Fuyukai kurikaeshite

[Piano Solo]

[Bridge]
Tadashii yume wa kanashii koe wa
Utsukushii? utagawashii? urayamashii?
Nee, dore?

[Chorus]
Katarenai nemurenai toroimerai
Anata no miteru shoutai
Daremo yomenai karute
Fukashigi shiritai dake
Owaranai koto wa nai toroimerai
Anata to matagu kyoukai
Daremo yomenai karute
Shishunki kizuguchi mune no uchi
Fukashigi shiritai dake

[Chorus]

Docchi mo shinjitsu datta no hontou yo
Kyou mo hitorigoto
Nannimo muri wo shinaide watashi aisaretai
[Chorus]
Uyamuya sayonara karui memai
Anata no inai genshoukai
Daremo yomenai karute
Jiishiki afuredashite

[Piano solo]

[Verse 2]
Kodou wo sekaizou wo
Itsumo kami awanai no itakute
Maiyo negaigoto
Nannimo utagawanaide mazari toke aitai

[Chorus]
Tawainai wakaranai riyuu sonzai
Anata to nokosu koukai
Daremo yomenai karute
Fuyukai kurikaeshite

[Piano Solo]

[Bridge]
Tadashii yume wa kanashii koe wa
Utsukushii? utagawashii? urayamashii?
Nee, dore?

[Chorus]
Katarenai nemurenai toroimerai
Anata no miteru shoutai
Daremo yomenai karute
Fukashigi shiritai dake
Owaranai koto wa nai toroimerai
Anata to matagu kyoukai
Daremo yomenai karute
Shishunki kizuguchi mune no uchi
Fukashigi shiritai dake

Uyamuya sayonara karui memai
Anata no inai genshoukai
Daremo yomenai karute
Jiishiki afuredashite

[Piano solo]

[Verse 2]
Kodou wo sekaizou wo
Itsumo kami awanai no itakute
Maiyo negaigoto
Nannimo utagawanaide mazari toke aitai

[Chorus]
Tawainai wakaranai riyuu sonzai
Anata to nokosu koukai
Daremo yomenai karute
Fuyukai kurikaeshite

[Piano Solo]

[Bridge]
Tadashii yume wa kanashii koe wa
Utsukushii? utagawashii? urayamashii?
Nee, dore?

[Chorus]
Katarenai nemurenai toroimerai
Anata no miteru shoutai
Daremo yomenai karute
Fukashigi shiritai dake
Owaranai koto wa nai toroimerai
Anata to matagu kyoukai
Daremo yomenai karute
Shishunki kizuguchi mune no uchi
Fukashigi shiritai dake

[Piano solo]

[Verse 2]
Kodou wo sekaizou wo
Itsumo kami awanai no itakute
Maiyo negaigoto
Nannimo utagawanaide mazari toke aitai

[Chorus]
Tawainai wakaranai riyuu sonzai
Anata to nokosu koukai
Daremo yomenai karute
Fuyukai kurikaeshite

[Piano Solo]

[Bridge]
Tadashii yume wa kanashii koe wa
Utsukushii? utagawashii? urayamashii?
Nee, dore?

[Chorus]
Katarenai nemurenai toroimerai
Anata no miteru shoutai
Daremo yomenai karute
Fukashigi shiritai dake
Owaranai koto wa nai toroimerai
Anata to matagu kyoukai
Daremo yomenai karute
Shishunki kizuguchi mune no uchi
Fukashigi shiritai dake

[Chorus]

Anata no miteru shoutai
Daremo yomenai karute
Fukashigi shiritai dake

[Verse 1]

Nannimo muri wo shinaide watashi aisaretai
[Chorus]
Uyamuya sayonara karui memai
Anata no inai genshoukai

Nannimo utagawanaide mazari toke aitai

[Chorus]
Tawainai wakaranai riyuu sonzai
Anata to nokosu koukai
Daremo yomenai karute
Fuyukai kurikaeshite

[Piano Solo]

[Bridge]
Tadashii yume wa kanashii koe wa
Utsukushii? utagawashii? urayamashii?
Nee, dore?

[Chorus]
Katarenai nemurenai toroimerai
Anata no miteru shoutai
Daremo yomenai karute
Fukashigi shiritai dake
Owaranai koto wa nai toroimerai
Anata to matagu kyoukai
Daremo yomenai karute
Shishunki kizuguchi mune no uchi
Fukashigi shiritai dake

[Chorus]
Katarenai nemurenai toroimerai
Anata no miteru shoutai
Daremo yomenai karute
Fukashigi shiritai dake

[Verse 1]
Uso mo genjitsu mo
Docchi mo shinjitsu datta no hontou yo
Kyou mo hitorigoto
Nannimo muri wo shinaide watashi aisaretai
[Chorus]
Uyamuya sayonara karui memai
Anata no inai genshoukai
Daremo yomenai karute
Jiishiki afuredashite

[Piano solo]

[Verse 2]

Anata to nokosu koukai
Daremo yomenai karute
Fuyukai kurikaeshite

[Piano Solo]

[Bridge]
Tadashii yume wa kanashii koe wa
Utsukushii? utagawashii? urayamashii?
Nee, dore?

[Chorus]
Katarenai nemurenai toroimerai
Anata no miteru shoutai
Daremo yomenai karute
Fukashigi shiritai dake
Owaranai koto wa nai toroimerai
Anata to matagu kyoukai
Daremo yomenai karute
Shishunki kizuguchi mune no uchi
Fukashigi shiritai dake

[Chorus]
Katarenai nemurenai toroimerai
Anata no miteru shoutai
Daremo yomenai karute
Fukashigi shiritai dake

[Verse 1]
Uso mo genjitsu mo
Docchi mo shinjitsu datta no hontou yo
Kyou mo hitorigoto
Nannimo muri wo shinaide watashi aisaretai
[Chorus]
Uyamuya sayonara karui memai
Anata no inai genshoukai
Daremo yomenai karute
Jiishiki afuredashite

[Piano solo]

[Verse 2]
Kodou wo sekaizou wo
Itsumo kami awanai no itakute
Maiyo negaigoto
Nannimo utagawanaide mazari toke aitai

Tadashii yume wa kanashii koe wa
Utsukushii? utagawashii? urayamashii?
Nee, dore?

[Chorus]
Katarenai nemurenai toroimerai
Anata no miteru shoutai
Daremo yomenai karute
Fukashigi shiritai dake
Owaranai koto wa nai toroimerai
Anata to matagu kyoukai
Daremo yomenai karute
Shishunki kizuguchi mune no uchi
Fukashigi shiritai dake

[Chorus]
Katarenai nemurenai toroimerai
Anata no miteru shoutai
Daremo yomenai karute
Fukashigi shiritai dake

[Verse 1]
Uso mo genjitsu mo
Docchi mo shinjitsu datta no hontou yo
Kyou mo hitorigoto
Nannimo muri wo shinaide watashi aisaretai
[Chorus]
Uyamuya sayonara karui memai
Anata no inai genshoukai
Daremo yomenai karute
Jiishiki afuredashite

[Piano solo]

[Verse 2]
Kodou wo sekaizou wo
Itsumo kami awanai no itakute
Maiyo negaigoto
Nannimo utagawanaide mazari toke aitai

[Chorus]
Tawainai wakaranai riyuu sonzai
Anata to nokosu koukai
Daremo yomenai karute
Fuyukai kurikaeshite

Katarenai nemurenai toroimerai
Anata no miteru shoutai
Daremo yomenai karute
Fukashigi shiritai dake
Owaranai koto wa nai toroimerai
Anata to matagu kyoukai
Daremo yomenai karute
Shishunki kizuguchi mune no uchi
Fukashigi shiritai dake

[Chorus]
Katarenai nemurenai toroimerai
Anata no miteru shoutai
Daremo yomenai karute
Fukashigi shiritai dake

[Verse 1]
Uso mo genjitsu mo
Docchi mo shinjitsu datta no hontou yo
Kyou mo hitorigoto
Nannimo muri wo shinaide watashi aisaretai
[Chorus]
Uyamuya sayonara karui memai
Anata no inai genshoukai
Daremo yomenai karute
Jiishiki afuredashite

[Piano solo]

[Verse 2]
Kodou wo sekaizou wo
Itsumo kami awanai no itakute
Maiyo negaigoto
Nannimo utagawanaide mazari toke aitai

[Chorus]
Tawainai wakaranai riyuu sonzai
Anata to nokosu koukai
Daremo yomenai karute
Fuyukai kurikaeshite

[Piano Solo]

[Bridge]
Tadashii yume wa kanashii koe wa
Utsukushii? utagawashii? urayamashii?
Nee, dore?

Owaranai koto wa nai toroimerai
Anata to matagu kyoukai
Daremo yomenai karute
Shishunki kizuguchi mune no uchi
Fukashigi shiritai dake

[Chorus]
Katarenai nemurenai toroimerai
Anata no miteru shoutai
Daremo yomenai karute
Fukashigi shiritai dake

[Verse 1]
Uso mo genjitsu mo
Docchi mo shinjitsu datta no hontou yo
Kyou mo hitorigoto
Nannimo muri wo shinaide watashi aisaretai
[Chorus]
Uyamuya sayonara karui memai
Anata no inai genshoukai
Daremo yomenai karute
Jiishiki afuredashite

[Piano solo]

[Verse 2]
Kodou wo sekaizou wo
Itsumo kami awanai no itakute
Maiyo negaigoto
Nannimo utagawanaide mazari toke aitai

[Chorus]
Tawainai wakaranai riyuu sonzai
Anata to nokosu koukai
Daremo yomenai karute
Fuyukai kurikaeshite

[Piano Solo]

[Bridge]
Tadashii yume wa kanashii koe wa
Utsukushii? utagawashii? urayamashii?
Nee, dore?

Fukashigi shiritai dake

[Chorus]
Katarenai nemurenai toroimerai
Anata no miteru shoutai
Daremo yomenai karute
Fukashigi shiritai dake

[Verse 1]
Uso mo genjitsu mo
Docchi mo shinjitsu datta no hontou yo
Kyou mo hitorigoto
Nannimo muri wo shinaide watashi aisaretai
[Chorus]
Uyamuya sayonara karui memai
Anata no inai genshoukai
Daremo yomenai karute
Jiishiki afuredashite

[Piano solo]

[Verse 2]
Kodou wo sekaizou wo
Itsumo kami awanai no itakute
Maiyo negaigoto
Nannimo utagawanaide mazari toke aitai

[Chorus]
Tawainai wakaranai riyuu sonzai
Anata to nokosu koukai
Daremo yomenai karute
Fuyukai kurikaeshite

[Piano Solo]

[Bridge]
Tadashii yume wa kanashii koe wa
Utsukushii? utagawashii? urayamashii?
Nee, dore?

Daremo yomenai karute
Fukashigi shiritai dake

[Verse 1]
Uso mo genjitsu mo
Docchi mo shinjitsu datta no hontou yo
Kyou mo hitorigoto
Nannimo muri wo shinaide watashi aisaretai
[Chorus]
Uyamuya sayonara karui memai
Anata no inai genshoukai
Daremo yomenai karute
Jiishiki afuredashite

[Piano solo]

[Verse 2]
Kodou wo sekaizou wo
Itsumo kami awanai no itakute
Maiyo negaigoto
Nannimo utagawanaide mazari toke aitai

[Chorus]
Tawainai wakaranai riyuu sonzai
Anata to nokosu koukai
Daremo yomenai karute
Fuyukai kurikaeshite

[Piano Solo]

[Bridge]
Tadashii yume wa kanashii koe wa
Utsukushii? utagawashii? urayamashii?
Nee, dore?

[Chorus]
Katarenai nemurenai toroimerai
Anata no miteru shoutai
Daremo yomenai karute
Fukashigi shiritai dake
Owaranai koto wa nai toroimerai
Anata to matagu kyoukai
Daremo yomenai karute
Shishunki kizuguchi mune no uchi
Fukashigi shiritai dake

[Chorus]

Docchi mo shinjitsu datta no hontou yo
Kyou mo hitorigoto
Nannimo muri wo shinaide watashi aisaretai
[Chorus]
Uyamuya sayonara karui memai
Anata no inai genshoukai
Daremo yomenai karute
Jiishiki afuredashite

[Piano solo]

[Verse 2]
Kodou wo sekaizou wo
Itsumo kami awanai no itakute
Maiyo negaigoto
Nannimo utagawanaide mazari toke aitai

[Chorus]
Tawainai wakaranai riyuu sonzai
Anata to nokosu koukai
Daremo yomenai karute
Fuyukai kurikaeshite

[Piano Solo]

[Bridge]
Tadashii yume wa kanashii koe wa
Utsukushii? utagawashii? urayamashii?
Nee, dore?

[Chorus]
Katarenai nemurenai toroimerai
Anata no miteru shoutai
Daremo yomenai karute
Fukashigi shiritai dake
Owaranai koto wa nai toroimerai
Anata to matagu kyoukai
Daremo yomenai karute
Shishunki kizuguchi mune no uchi
Fukashigi shiritai dake

Uyamuya sayonara karui memai
Anata no inai genshoukai
Daremo yomenai karute
Jiishiki afuredashite

[Piano solo]

[Verse 2]
Kodou wo sekaizou wo
Itsumo kami awanai no itakute
Maiyo negaigoto
Nannimo utagawanaide mazari toke aitai

[Chorus]
Tawainai wakaranai riyuu sonzai
Anata to nokosu koukai
Daremo yomenai karute
Fuyukai kurikaeshite

[Piano Solo]

[Bridge]
Tadashii yume wa kanashii koe wa
Utsukushii? utagawashii? urayamashii?
Nee, dore?

[Chorus]
Katarenai nemurenai toroimerai
Anata no miteru shoutai
Daremo yomenai karute
Fukashigi shiritai dake
Owaranai koto wa nai toroimerai
Anata to matagu kyoukai
Daremo yomenai karute
Shishunki kizuguchi mune no uchi
Fukashigi shiritai dake

[Piano solo]

[Verse 2]
Kodou wo sekaizou wo
Itsumo kami awanai no itakute
Maiyo negaigoto
Nannimo utagawanaide mazari toke aitai

[Chorus]
Tawainai wakaranai riyuu sonzai
Anata to nokosu koukai
Daremo yomenai karute
Fuyukai kurikaeshite

[Piano Solo]

[Bridge]
Tadashii yume wa kanashii koe wa
Utsukushii? utagawashii? urayamashii?
Nee, dore?

[Chorus]
Katarenai nemurenai toroimerai
Anata no miteru shoutai
Daremo yomenai karute
Fukashigi shiritai dake
Owaranai koto wa nai toroimerai
Anata to matagu kyoukai
Daremo yomenai karute
Shishunki kizuguchi mune no uchi
Fukashigi shiritai dake

[Chorus]

Anata no miteru shoutai
Daremo yomenai karute
Fukashigi shiritai dake

[Verse 1]

Nannimo muri wo shinaide watashi aisaretai
[Chorus]
Uyamuya sayonara karui memai
Anata no inai genshoukai

Nannimo utagawanaide mazari toke aitai

[Chorus]
Tawainai wakaranai riyuu sonzai
Anata to nokosu koukai
Daremo yomenai karute
Fuyukai kurikaeshite

[Piano Solo]

[Bridge]
Tadashii yume wa kanashii koe wa
Utsukushii? utagawashii? urayamashii?
Nee, dore?

[Chorus]
Katarenai nemurenai toroimerai
Anata no miteru shoutai
Daremo yomenai karute
Fukashigi shiritai dake
Owaranai koto wa nai toroimerai
Anata to matagu kyoukai
Daremo yomenai karute
Shishunki kizuguchi mune no uchi
Fukashigi shiritai dake

[Chorus]
Katarenai nemurenai toroimerai
Anata no miteru shoutai
Daremo yomenai karute
Fukashigi shiritai dake

[Verse 1]
Uso mo genjitsu mo
Docchi mo shinjitsu datta no hontou yo
Kyou mo hitorigoto
Nannimo muri wo shinaide watashi aisaretai
[Chorus]
Uyamuya sayonara karui memai
Anata no inai genshoukai
Daremo yomenai karute
Jiishiki afuredashite

[Piano solo]

[Verse 2]

Anata to nokosu koukai
Daremo yomenai karute
Fuyukai kurikaeshite

[Piano Solo]

[Bridge]
Tadashii yume wa kanashii koe wa
Utsukushii? utagawashii? urayamashii?
Nee, dore?

[Chorus]
Katarenai nemurenai toroimerai
Anata no miteru shoutai
Daremo yomenai karute
Fukashigi shiritai dake
Owaranai koto wa nai toroimerai
Anata to matagu kyoukai
Daremo yomenai karute
Shishunki kizuguchi mune no uchi
Fukashigi shiritai dake

[Chorus]
Katarenai nemurenai toroimerai
Anata no miteru shoutai
Daremo yomenai karute
Fukashigi shiritai dake

[Verse 1]
Uso mo genjitsu mo
Docchi mo shinjitsu datta no hontou yo
Kyou mo hitorigoto
Nannimo muri wo shinaide watashi aisaretai
[Chorus]
Uyamuya sayonara karui memai
Anata no inai genshoukai
Daremo yomenai karute
Jiishiki afuredashite

[Piano solo]

[Verse 2]
Kodou wo sekaizou wo
Itsumo kami awanai no itakute
Maiyo negaigoto
Nannimo utagawanaide mazari toke aitai

Tadashii yume wa kanashii koe wa
Utsukushii? utagawashii? urayamashii?
Nee, dore?

[Chorus]
Katarenai nemurenai toroimerai
Anata no miteru shoutai
Daremo yomenai karute
Fukashigi shiritai dake
Owaranai koto wa nai toroimerai
Anata to matagu kyoukai
Daremo yomenai karute
Shishunki kizuguchi mune no uchi
Fukashigi shiritai dake

[Chorus]
Katarenai nemurenai toroimerai
Anata no miteru shoutai
Daremo yomenai karute
Fukashigi shiritai dake

[Verse 1]
Uso mo genjitsu mo
Docchi mo shinjitsu datta no hontou yo
Kyou mo hitorigoto
Nannimo muri wo shinaide watashi aisaretai
[Chorus]
Uyamuya sayonara karui memai
Anata no inai genshoukai
Daremo yomenai karute
Jiishiki afuredashite

[Piano solo]

[Verse 2]
Kodou wo sekaizou wo
Itsumo kami awanai no itakute
Maiyo negaigoto
Nannimo utagawanaide mazari toke aitai

[Chorus]
Tawainai wakaranai riyuu sonzai
Anata to nokosu koukai
Daremo yomenai karute
Fuyukai kurikaeshite

Katarenai nemurenai toroimerai
Anata no miteru shoutai
Daremo yomenai karute
Fukashigi shiritai dake
Owaranai koto wa nai toroimerai
Anata to matagu kyoukai
Daremo yomenai karute
Shishunki kizuguchi mune no uchi
Fukashigi shiritai dake

[Chorus]
Katarenai nemurenai toroimerai
Anata no miteru shoutai
Daremo yomenai karute
Fukashigi shiritai dake

[Verse 1]
Uso mo genjitsu mo
Docchi mo shinjitsu datta no hontou yo
Kyou mo hitorigoto
Nannimo muri wo shinaide watashi aisaretai
[Chorus]
Uyamuya sayonara karui memai
Anata no inai genshoukai
Daremo yomenai karute
Jiishiki afuredashite

[Piano solo]

[Verse 2]
Kodou wo sekaizou wo
Itsumo kami awanai no itakute
Maiyo negaigoto
Nannimo utagawanaide mazari toke aitai

[Chorus]
Tawainai wakaranai riyuu sonzai
Anata to nokosu koukai
Daremo yomenai karute
Fuyukai kurikaeshite

[Piano Solo]

[Bridge]
Tadashii yume wa kanashii koe wa
Utsukushii? utagawashii? urayamashii?
Nee, dore?

Owaranai koto wa nai toroimerai
Anata to matagu kyoukai
Daremo yomenai karute
Shishunki kizuguchi mune no uchi
Fukashigi shiritai dake

[Chorus]
Katarenai nemurenai toroimerai
Anata no miteru shoutai
Daremo yomenai karute
Fukashigi shiritai dake

[Verse 1]
Uso mo genjitsu mo
Docchi mo shinjitsu datta no hontou yo
Kyou mo hitorigoto
Nannimo muri wo shinaide watashi aisaretai
[Chorus]
Uyamuya sayonara karui memai
Anata no inai genshoukai
Daremo yomenai karute
Jiishiki afuredashite

[Piano solo]

[Verse 2]
Kodou wo sekaizou wo
Itsumo kami awanai no itakute
Maiyo negaigoto
Nannimo utagawanaide mazari toke aitai

[Chorus]
Tawainai wakaranai riyuu sonzai
Anata to nokosu koukai
Daremo yomenai karute
Fuyukai kurikaeshite

[Piano Solo]

[Bridge]
Tadashii yume wa kanashii koe wa
Utsukushii? utagawashii? urayamashii?
Nee, dore?

Fukashigi shiritai dake

[Chorus]
Katarenai nemurenai toroimerai
Anata no miteru shoutai
Daremo yomenai karute
Fukashigi shiritai dake

[Verse 1]
Uso mo genjitsu mo
Docchi mo shinjitsu datta no hontou yo
Kyou mo hitorigoto
Nannimo muri wo shinaide watashi aisaretai
[Chorus]
Uyamuya sayonara karui memai
Anata no inai genshoukai
Daremo yomenai karute
Jiishiki afuredashite

[Piano solo]

[Verse 2]
Kodou wo sekaizou wo
Itsumo kami awanai no itakute
Maiyo negaigoto
Nannimo utagawanaide mazari toke aitai

[Chorus]
Tawainai wakaranai riyuu sonzai
Anata to nokosu koukai
Daremo yomenai karute
Fuyukai kurikaeshite

[Piano Solo]

[Bridge]
Tadashii yume wa kanashii koe wa
Utsukushii? utagawashii? urayamashii?
Nee, dore?

Daremo yomenai karute
Fukashigi shiritai dake

[Verse 1]
Uso mo genjitsu mo
Docchi mo shinjitsu datta no hontou yo
Kyou mo hitorigoto
Nannimo muri wo shinaide watashi aisaretai
[Chorus]
Uyamuya sayonara karui memai
Anata no inai genshoukai
Daremo yomenai karute
Jiishiki afuredashite

[Piano solo]

[Verse 2]
Kodou wo sekaizou wo
Itsumo kami awanai no itakute
Maiyo negaigoto
Nannimo utagawanaide mazari toke aitai

[Chorus]
Tawainai wakaranai riyuu sonzai
Anata to nokosu koukai
Daremo yomenai karute
Fuyukai kurikaeshite

[Piano Solo]

[Bridge]
Tadashii yume wa kanashii koe wa
Utsukushii? utagawashii? urayamashii?
Nee, dore?

[Chorus]
Katarenai nemurenai toroimerai
Anata no miteru shoutai
Daremo yomenai karute
Fukashigi shiritai dake
Owaranai koto wa nai toroimerai
Anata to matagu kyoukai
Daremo yomenai karute
Shishunki kizuguchi mune no uchi
Fukashigi shiritai dake

[Chorus]

Docchi mo shinjitsu datta no hontou yo
Kyou mo hitorigoto
Nannimo muri wo shinaide watashi aisaretai
[Chorus]
Uyamuya sayonara karui memai
Anata no inai genshoukai
Daremo yomenai karute
Jiishiki afuredashite

[Piano solo]

[Verse 2]
Kodou wo sekaizou wo
Itsumo kami awanai no itakute
Maiyo negaigoto
Nannimo utagawanaide mazari toke aitai

[Chorus]
Tawainai wakaranai riyuu sonzai
Anata to nokosu koukai
Daremo yomenai karute
Fuyukai kurikaeshite

[Piano Solo]

[Bridge]
Tadashii yume wa kanashii koe wa
Utsukushii? utagawashii? urayamashii?
Nee, dore?

[Chorus]
Katarenai nemurenai toroimerai
Anata no miteru shoutai
Daremo yomenai karute
Fukashigi shiritai dake
Owaranai koto wa nai toroimerai
Anata to matagu kyoukai
Daremo yomenai karute
Shishunki kizuguchi mune no uchi
Fukashigi shiritai dake

Uyamuya sayonara karui memai
Anata no inai genshoukai
Daremo yomenai karute
Jiishiki afuredashite

[Piano solo]

[Verse 2]
Kodou wo sekaizou wo
Itsumo kami awanai no itakute
Maiyo negaigoto
Nannimo utagawanaide mazari toke aitai

[Chorus]
Tawainai wakaranai riyuu sonzai
Anata to nokosu koukai
Daremo yomenai karute
Fuyukai kurikaeshite

[Piano Solo]

[Bridge]
Tadashii yume wa kanashii koe wa
Utsukushii? utagawashii? urayamashii?
Nee, dore?

[Chorus]
Katarenai nemurenai toroimerai
Anata no miteru shoutai
Daremo yomenai karute
Fukashigi shiritai dake
Owaranai koto wa nai toroimerai
Anata to matagu kyoukai
Daremo yomenai karute
Shishunki kizuguchi mune no uchi
Fukashigi shiritai dake

[Piano solo]

[Verse 2]
Kodou wo sekaizou wo
Itsumo kami awanai no itakute
Maiyo negaigoto
Nannimo utagawanaide mazari toke aitai

[Chorus]
Tawainai wakaranai riyuu sonzai
Anata to nokosu koukai
Daremo yomenai karute
Fuyukai kurikaeshite

[Piano Solo]

[Bridge]
Tadashii yume wa kanashii koe wa
Utsukushii? utagawashii? urayamashii?
Nee, dore?

[Chorus]
Katarenai nemurenai toroimerai
Anata no miteru shoutai
Daremo yomenai karute
Fukashigi shiritai dake
Owaranai koto wa nai toroimerai
Anata to matagu kyoukai
Daremo yomenai karute
Shishunki kizuguchi mune no uchi
Fukashigi shiritai dake

[Chorus]

Anata no miteru shoutai
Daremo yomenai karute
Fukashigi shiritai dake

[Verse 1]

Nannimo muri wo shinaide watashi aisaretai
[Chorus]
Uyamuya sayonara karui memai
Anata no inai genshoukai

Nannimo utagawanaide mazari toke aitai

[Chorus]
Tawainai wakaranai riyuu sonzai
Anata to nokosu koukai
Daremo yomenai karute
Fuyukai kurikaeshite

[Piano Solo]

[Bridge]
Tadashii yume wa kanashii koe wa
Utsukushii? utagawashii? urayamashii?
Nee, dore?

[Chorus]
Katarenai nemurenai toroimerai
Anata no miteru shoutai
Daremo yomenai karute
Fukashigi shiritai dake
Owaranai koto wa nai toroimerai
Anata to matagu kyoukai
Daremo yomenai karute
Shishunki kizuguchi mune no uchi
Fukashigi shiritai dake

[Chorus]
Katarenai nemurenai toroimerai
Anata no miteru shoutai
Daremo yomenai karute
Fukashigi shiritai dake

[Verse 1]
Uso mo genjitsu mo
Docchi mo shinjitsu datta no hontou yo
Kyou mo hitorigoto
Nannimo muri wo shinaide watashi aisaretai
[Chorus]
Uyamuya sayonara karui memai
Anata no inai genshoukai
Daremo yomenai karute
Jiishiki afuredashite

[Piano solo]

[Verse 2]

Anata to nokosu koukai
Daremo yomenai karute
Fuyukai kurikaeshite

[Piano Solo]

[Bridge]
Tadashii yume wa kanashii koe wa
Utsukushii? utagawashii? urayamashii?
Nee, dore?

[Chorus]
Katarenai nemurenai toroimerai
Anata no miteru shoutai
Daremo yomenai karute
Fukashigi shiritai dake
Owaranai koto wa nai toroimerai
Anata to matagu kyoukai
Daremo yomenai karute
Shishunki kizuguchi mune no uchi
Fukashigi shiritai dake

[Chorus]
Katarenai nemurenai toroimerai
Anata no miteru shoutai
Daremo yomenai karute
Fukashigi shiritai dake

[Verse 1]
Uso mo genjitsu mo
Docchi mo shinjitsu datta no hontou yo
Kyou mo hitorigoto
Nannimo muri wo shinaide watashi aisaretai
[Chorus]
Uyamuya sayonara karui memai
Anata no inai genshoukai
Daremo yomenai karute
Jiishiki afuredashite

[Piano solo]

[Verse 2]
Kodou wo sekaizou wo
Itsumo kami awanai no itakute
Maiyo negaigoto
Nannimo utagawanaide mazari toke aitai

Tadashii yume wa kanashii koe wa
Utsukushii? utagawashii? urayamashii?
Nee, dore?

[Chorus]
Katarenai nemurenai toroimerai
Anata no miteru shoutai
Daremo yomenai karute
Fukashigi shiritai dake
Owaranai koto wa nai toroimerai
Anata to matagu kyoukai
Daremo yomenai karute
Shishunki kizuguchi mune no uchi
Fukashigi shiritai dake

[Chorus]
Katarenai nemurenai toroimerai
Anata no miteru shoutai
Daremo yomenai karute
Fukashigi shiritai dake

[Verse 1]
Uso mo genjitsu mo
Docchi mo shinjitsu datta no hontou yo
Kyou mo hitorigoto
Nannimo muri wo shinaide watashi aisaretai
[Chorus]
Uyamuya sayonara karui memai
Anata no inai genshoukai
Daremo yomenai karute
Jiishiki afuredashite

[Piano solo]

[Verse 2]
Kodou wo sekaizou wo
Itsumo kami awanai no itakute
Maiyo negaigoto
Nannimo utagawanaide mazari toke aitai

[Chorus]
Tawainai wakaranai riyuu sonzai
Anata to nokosu koukai
Daremo yomenai karute
Fuyukai kurikaeshite

Katarenai nemurenai toroimerai
Anata no miteru shoutai
Daremo yomenai karute
Fukashigi shiritai dake
Owaranai koto wa nai toroimerai
Anata to matagu kyoukai
Daremo yomenai karute
Shishunki kizuguchi mune no uchi
Fukashigi shiritai dake

[Chorus]
Katarenai nemurenai toroimerai
Anata no miteru shoutai
Daremo yomenai karute
Fukashigi shiritai dake

[Verse 1]
Uso mo genjitsu mo
Docchi mo shinjitsu datta no hontou yo
Kyou mo hitorigoto
Nannimo muri wo shinaide watashi aisaretai
[Chorus]
Uyamuya sayonara karui memai
Anata no inai genshoukai
Daremo yomenai karute
Jiishiki afuredashite

[Piano solo]

[Verse 2]
Kodou wo sekaizou wo
Itsumo kami awanai no itakute
Maiyo negaigoto
Nannimo utagawanaide mazari toke aitai

[Chorus]
Tawainai wakaranai riyuu sonzai
Anata to nokosu koukai
Daremo yomenai karute
Fuyukai kurikaeshite

[Piano Solo]

[Bridge]
Tadashii yume wa kanashii koe wa
Utsukushii? utagawashii? urayamashii?
Nee, dore?

Owaranai koto wa nai toroimerai
Anata to matagu kyoukai
Daremo yomenai karute
Shishunki kizuguchi mune no uchi
Fukashigi shiritai dake

[Chorus]
Katarenai nemurenai toroimerai
Anata no miteru shoutai
Daremo yomenai karute
Fukashigi shiritai dake

[Verse 1]
Uso mo genjitsu mo
Docchi mo shinjitsu datta no hontou yo
Kyou mo hitorigoto
Nannimo muri wo shinaide watashi aisaretai
[Chorus]
Uyamuya sayonara karui memai
Anata no inai genshoukai
Daremo yomenai karute
Jiishiki afuredashite

[Piano solo]

[Verse 2]
Kodou wo sekaizou wo
Itsumo kami awanai no itakute
Maiyo negaigoto
Nannimo utagawanaide mazari toke aitai

[Chorus]
Tawainai wakaranai riyuu sonzai
Anata to nokosu koukai
Daremo yomenai karute
Fuyukai kurikaeshite

[Piano Solo]

[Bridge]
Tadashii yume wa kanashii koe wa
Utsukushii? utagawashii? urayamashii?
Nee, dore?

Fukashigi shiritai dake

[Chorus]
Katarenai nemurenai toroimerai
Anata no miteru shoutai
Daremo yomenai karute
Fukashigi shiritai dake

[Verse 1]
Uso mo genjitsu mo
Docchi mo shinjitsu datta no hontou yo
Kyou mo hitorigoto
Nannimo muri wo shinaide watashi aisaretai
[Chorus]
Uyamuya sayonara karui memai
Anata no inai genshoukai
Daremo yomenai karute
Jiishiki afuredashite

[Piano solo]

[Verse 2]
Kodou wo sekaizou wo
Itsumo kami awanai no itakute
Maiyo negaigoto
Nannimo utagawanaide mazari toke aitai

[Chorus]
Tawainai wakaranai riyuu sonzai
Anata to nokosu koukai
Daremo yomenai karute
Fuyukai kurikaeshite

[Piano Solo]

[Bridge]
Tadashii yume wa kanashii koe wa
Utsukushii? utagawashii? urayamashii?
Nee, dore?

Daremo yomenai karute
Fukashigi shiritai dake

[Verse 1]
Uso mo genjitsu mo
Docchi mo shinjitsu datta no hontou yo
Kyou mo hitorigoto
Nannimo muri wo shinaide watashi aisaretai
[Chorus]
Uyamuya sayonara karui memai
Anata no inai genshoukai
Daremo yomenai karute
Jiishiki afuredashite

[Piano solo]

[Verse 2]
Kodou wo sekaizou wo
Itsumo kami awanai no itakute
Maiyo negaigoto
Nannimo utagawanaide mazari toke aitai

[Chorus]
Tawainai wakaranai riyuu sonzai
Anata to nokosu koukai
Daremo yomenai karute
Fuyukai kurikaeshite

[Piano Solo]

[Bridge]
Tadashii yume wa kanashii koe wa
Utsukushii? utagawashii? urayamashii?
Nee, dore?

[Chorus]
Katarenai nemurenai toroimerai
Anata no miteru shoutai
Daremo yomenai karute
Fukashigi shiritai dake
Owaranai koto wa nai toroimerai
Anata to matagu kyoukai
Daremo yomenai karute
Shishunki kizuguchi mune no uchi
Fukashigi shiritai dake

[Chorus]

Docchi mo shinjitsu datta no hontou yo
Kyou mo hitorigoto
Nannimo muri wo shinaide watashi aisaretai
[Chorus]
Uyamuya sayonara karui memai
Anata no inai genshoukai
Daremo yomenai karute
Jiishiki afuredashite

[Piano solo]

[Verse 2]
Kodou wo sekaizou wo
Itsumo kami awanai no itakute
Maiyo negaigoto
Nannimo utagawanaide mazari toke aitai

[Chorus]
Tawainai wakaranai riyuu sonzai
Anata to nokosu koukai
Daremo yomenai karute
Fuyukai kurikaeshite

[Piano Solo]

[Bridge]
Tadashii yume wa kanashii koe wa
Utsukushii? utagawashii? urayamashii?
Nee, dore?

[Chorus]
Katarenai nemurenai toroimerai
Anata no miteru shoutai
Daremo yomenai karute
Fukashigi shiritai dake
Owaranai koto wa nai toroimerai
Anata to matagu kyoukai
Daremo yomenai karute
Shishunki kizuguchi mune no uchi
Fukashigi shiritai dake

Uyamuya sayonara karui memai
Anata no inai genshoukai
Daremo yomenai karute
Jiishiki afuredashite

[Piano solo]

[Verse 2]
Kodou wo sekaizou wo
Itsumo kami awanai no itakute
Maiyo negaigoto
Nannimo utagawanaide mazari toke aitai

[Chorus]
Tawainai wakaranai riyuu sonzai
Anata to nokosu koukai
Daremo yomenai karute
Fuyukai kurikaeshite

[Piano Solo]

[Bridge]
Tadashii yume wa kanashii koe wa
Utsukushii? utagawashii? urayamashii?
Nee, dore?

[Chorus]
Katarenai nemurenai toroimerai
Anata no miteru shoutai
Daremo yomenai karute
Fukashigi shiritai dake
Owaranai koto wa nai toroimerai
Anata to matagu kyoukai
Daremo yomenai karute
Shishunki kizuguchi mune no uchi
Fukashigi shiritai dake

[Piano solo]

[Verse 2]
Kodou wo sekaizou wo
Itsumo kami awanai no itakute
Maiyo negaigoto
Nannimo utagawanaide mazari toke aitai

[Chorus]
Tawainai wakaranai riyuu sonzai
Anata to nokosu koukai
Daremo yomenai karute
Fuyukai kurikaeshite

[Piano Solo]

[Bridge]
Tadashii yume wa kanashii koe wa
Utsukushii? utagawashii? urayamashii?
Nee, dore?

[Chorus]
Katarenai nemurenai toroimerai
Anata no miteru shoutai
Daremo yomenai karute
Fukashigi shiritai dake
Owaranai koto wa nai toroimerai
Anata to matagu kyoukai
Daremo yomenai karute
Shishunki kizuguchi mune no uchi
Fukashigi shiritai dake

[Chorus]

Anata no miteru shoutai
Daremo yomenai karute
Fukashigi shiritai dake

[Verse 1]

Nannimo muri wo shinaide watashi aisaretai
[Chorus]
Uyamuya sayonara karui memai
Anata no inai genshoukai

Nannimo utagawanaide mazari toke aitai

[Chorus]
Tawainai wakaranai riyuu sonzai
Anata to nokosu koukai
Daremo yomenai karute
Fuyukai kurikaeshite

[Piano Solo]

[Bridge]
Tadashii yume wa kanashii koe wa
Utsukushii? utagawashii? urayamashii?
Nee, dore?

[Chorus]
Katarenai nemurenai toroimerai
Anata no miteru shoutai
Daremo yomenai karute
Fukashigi shiritai dake
Owaranai koto wa nai toroimerai
Anata to matagu kyoukai
Daremo yomenai karute
Shishunki kizuguchi mune no uchi
Fukashigi shiritai dake

[Chorus]
Katarenai nemurenai toroimerai
Anata no miteru shoutai
Daremo yomenai karute
Fukashigi shiritai dake

[Verse 1]
Uso mo genjitsu mo
Docchi mo shinjitsu datta no hontou yo
Kyou mo hitorigoto
Nannimo muri wo shinaide watashi aisaretai
[Chorus]
Uyamuya sayonara karui memai
Anata no inai genshoukai
Daremo yomenai karute
Jiishiki afuredashite

[Piano solo]

[Verse 2]

Anata to nokosu koukai
Daremo yomenai karute
Fuyukai kurikaeshite

[Piano Solo]

[Bridge]
Tadashii yume wa kanashii koe wa
Utsukushii? utagawashii? urayamashii?
Nee, dore?

[Chorus]
Katarenai nemurenai toroimerai
Anata no miteru shoutai
Daremo yomenai karute
Fukashigi shiritai dake
Owaranai koto wa nai toroimerai
Anata to matagu kyoukai
Daremo yomenai karute
Shishunki kizuguchi mune no uchi
Fukashigi shiritai dake

[Chorus]
Katarenai nemurenai toroimerai
Anata no miteru shoutai
Daremo yomenai karute
Fukashigi shiritai dake

[Verse 1]
Uso mo genjitsu mo
Docchi mo shinjitsu datta no hontou yo
Kyou mo hitorigoto
Nannimo muri wo shinaide watashi aisaretai
[Chorus]
Uyamuya sayonara karui memai
Anata no inai genshoukai
Daremo yomenai karute
Jiishiki afuredashite

[Piano solo]

[Verse 2]
Kodou wo sekaizou wo
Itsumo kami awanai no itakute
Maiyo negaigoto
Nannimo utagawanaide mazari toke aitai

Tadashii yume wa kanashii koe wa
Utsukushii? utagawashii? urayamashii?
Nee, dore?

[Chorus]
Katarenai nemurenai toroimerai
Anata no miteru shoutai
Daremo yomenai karute
Fukashigi shiritai dake
Owaranai koto wa nai toroimerai
Anata to matagu kyoukai
Daremo yomenai karute
Shishunki kizuguchi mune no uchi
Fukashigi shiritai dake

[Chorus]
Katarenai nemurenai toroimerai
Anata no miteru shoutai
Daremo yomenai karute
Fukashigi shiritai dake

[Verse 1]
Uso mo genjitsu mo
Docchi mo shinjitsu datta no hontou yo
Kyou mo hitorigoto
Nannimo muri wo shinaide watashi aisaretai
[Chorus]
Uyamuya sayonara karui memai
Anata no inai genshoukai
Daremo yomenai karute
Jiishiki afuredashite

[Piano solo]

[Verse 2]
Kodou wo sekaizou wo
Itsumo kami awanai no itakute
Maiyo negaigoto
Nannimo utagawanaide mazari toke aitai

[Chorus]
Tawainai wakaranai riyuu sonzai
Anata to nokosu koukai
Daremo yomenai karute
Fuyukai kurikaeshite

Katarenai nemurenai toroimerai
Anata no miteru shoutai
Daremo yomenai karute
Fukashigi shiritai dake
Owaranai koto wa nai toroimerai
Anata to matagu kyoukai
Daremo yomenai karute
Shishunki kizuguchi mune no uchi
Fukashigi shiritai dake

[Chorus]
Katarenai nemurenai toroimerai
Anata no miteru shoutai
Daremo yomenai karute
Fukashigi shiritai dake

[Verse 1]
Uso mo genjitsu mo
Docchi mo shinjitsu datta no hontou yo
Kyou mo hitorigoto
Nannimo muri wo shinaide watashi aisaretai
[Chorus]
Uyamuya sayonara karui memai
Anata no inai genshoukai
Daremo yomenai karute
Jiishiki afuredashite

[Piano solo]

[Verse 2]
Kodou wo sekaizou wo
Itsumo kami awanai no itakute
Maiyo negaigoto
Nannimo utagawanaide mazari toke aitai

[Chorus]
Tawainai wakaranai riyuu sonzai
Anata to nokosu koukai
Daremo yomenai karute
Fuyukai kurikaeshite

[Piano Solo]

[Bridge]
Tadashii yume wa kanashii koe wa
Utsukushii? utagawashii? urayamashii?
Nee, dore?

Owaranai koto wa nai toroimerai
Anata to matagu kyoukai
Daremo yomenai karute
Shishunki kizuguchi mune no uchi
Fukashigi shiritai dake

[Chorus]
Katarenai nemurenai toroimerai
Anata no miteru shoutai
Daremo yomenai karute
Fukashigi shiritai dake

[Verse 1]
Uso mo genjitsu mo
Docchi mo shinjitsu datta no hontou yo
Kyou mo hitorigoto
Nannimo muri wo shinaide watashi aisaretai
[Chorus]
Uyamuya sayonara karui memai
Anata no inai genshoukai
Daremo yomenai karute
Jiishiki afuredashite

[Piano solo]

[Verse 2]
Kodou wo sekaizou wo
Itsumo kami awanai no itakute
Maiyo negaigoto
Nannimo utagawanaide mazari toke aitai

[Chorus]
Tawainai wakaranai riyuu sonzai
Anata to nokosu koukai
Daremo yomenai karute
Fuyukai kurikaeshite

[Piano Solo]

[Bridge]
Tadashii yume wa kanashii koe wa
Utsukushii? utagawashii? urayamashii?
Nee, dore?

Fukashigi shiritai dake

[Chorus]
Katarenai nemurenai toroimerai
Anata no miteru shoutai
Daremo yomenai karute
Fukashigi shiritai dake

[Verse 1]
Uso mo genjitsu mo
Docchi mo shinjitsu datta no hontou yo
Kyou mo hitorigoto
Nannimo muri wo shinaide watashi aisaretai
[Chorus]
Uyamuya sayonara karui memai
Anata no inai genshoukai
Daremo yomenai karute
Jiishiki afuredashite

[Piano solo]

[Verse 2]
Kodou wo sekaizou wo
Itsumo kami awanai no itakute
Maiyo negaigoto
Nannimo utagawanaide mazari toke aitai

[Chorus]
Tawainai wakaranai riyuu sonzai
Anata to nokosu koukai
Daremo yomenai karute
Fuyukai kurikaeshite

[Piano Solo]

[Bridge]
Tadashii yume wa kanashii koe wa
Utsukushii? utagawashii? urayamashii?
Nee, dore?

Daremo yomenai karute
Fukashigi shiritai dake

[Verse 1]
Uso mo genjitsu mo
Docchi mo shinjitsu datta no hontou yo
Kyou mo hitorigoto
Nannimo muri wo shinaide watashi aisaretai
[Chorus]
Uyamuya sayonara karui memai
Anata no inai genshoukai
Daremo yomenai karute
Jiishiki afuredashite

[Piano solo]

[Verse 2]
Kodou wo sekaizou wo
Itsumo kami awanai no itakute
Maiyo negaigoto
Nannimo utagawanaide mazari toke aitai

[Chorus]
Tawainai wakaranai riyuu sonzai
Anata to nokosu koukai
Daremo yomenai karute
Fuyukai kurikaeshite

[Piano Solo]

[Bridge]
Tadashii yume wa kanashii koe wa
Utsukushii? utagawashii? urayamashii?
Nee, dore?

[Chorus]
Katarenai nemurenai toroimerai
Anata no miteru shoutai
Daremo yomenai karute
Fukashigi shiritai dake
Owaranai koto wa nai toroimerai
Anata to matagu kyoukai
Daremo yomenai karute
Shishunki kizuguchi mune no uchi
Fukashigi shiritai dake

[Chorus]

Docchi mo shinjitsu datta no hontou yo
Kyou mo hitorigoto
Nannimo muri wo shinaide watashi aisaretai
[Chorus]
Uyamuya sayonara karui memai
Anata no inai genshoukai
Daremo yomenai karute
Jiishiki afuredashite

[Piano solo]

[Verse 2]
Kodou wo sekaizou wo
Itsumo kami awanai no itakute
Maiyo negaigoto
Nannimo utagawanaide mazari toke aitai

[Chorus]
Tawainai wakaranai riyuu sonzai
Anata to nokosu koukai
Daremo yomenai karute
Fuyukai kurikaeshite

[Piano Solo]

[Bridge]
Tadashii yume wa kanashii koe wa
Utsukushii? utagawashii? urayamashii?
Nee, dore?

[Chorus]
Katarenai nemurenai toroimerai
Anata no miteru shoutai
Daremo yomenai karute
Fukashigi shiritai dake
Owaranai koto wa nai toroimerai
Anata to matagu kyoukai
Daremo yomenai karute
Shishunki kizuguchi mune no uchi
Fukashigi shiritai dake

Uyamuya sayonara karui memai
Anata no inai genshoukai
Daremo yomenai karute
Jiishiki afuredashite

[Piano solo]

[Verse 2]
Kodou wo sekaizou wo
Itsumo kami awanai no itakute
Maiyo negaigoto
Nannimo utagawanaide mazari toke aitai

[Chorus]
Tawainai wakaranai riyuu sonzai
Anata to nokosu koukai
Daremo yomenai karute
Fuyukai kurikaeshite

[Piano Solo]

[Bridge]
Tadashii yume wa kanashii koe wa
Utsukushii? utagawashii? urayamashii?
Nee, dore?

[Chorus]
Katarenai nemurenai toroimerai
Anata no miteru shoutai
Daremo yomenai karute
Fukashigi shiritai dake
Owaranai koto wa nai toroimerai
Anata to matagu kyoukai
Daremo yomenai karute
Shishunki kizuguchi mune no uchi
Fukashigi shiritai dake

[Piano solo]

[Verse 2]
Kodou wo sekaizou wo
Itsumo kami awanai no itakute
Maiyo negaigoto
Nannimo utagawanaide mazari toke aitai

[Chorus]
Tawainai wakaranai riyuu sonzai
Anata to nokosu koukai
Daremo yomenai karute
Fuyukai kurikaeshite

[Piano Solo]

[Bridge]
Tadashii yume wa kanashii koe wa
Utsukushii? utagawashii? urayamashii?
Nee, dore?

[Chorus]
Katarenai nemurenai toroimerai
Anata no miteru shoutai
Daremo yomenai karute
Fukashigi shiritai dake
Owaranai koto wa nai toroimerai
Anata to matagu kyoukai
Daremo yomenai karute
Shishunki kizuguchi mune no uchi
Fukashigi shiritai dake

[Chorus]

Anata no miteru shoutai
Daremo yomenai karute
Fukashigi shiritai dake

[Verse 1]

Nannimo muri wo shinaide watashi aisaretai
[Chorus]
Uyamuya sayonara karui memai
Anata no inai genshoukai

Nannimo utagawanaide mazari toke aitai

[Chorus]
Tawainai wakaranai riyuu sonzai
Anata to nokosu koukai
Daremo yomenai karute
Fuyukai kurikaeshite

[Piano Solo]

[Bridge]
Tadashii yume wa kanashii koe wa
Utsukushii? utagawashii? urayamashii?
Nee, dore?

[Chorus]
Katarenai nemurenai toroimerai
Anata no miteru shoutai
Daremo yomenai karute
Fukashigi shiritai dake
Owaranai koto wa nai toroimerai
Anata to matagu kyoukai
Daremo yomenai karute
Shishunki kizuguchi mune no uchi
Fukashigi shiritai dake

[Chorus]
Katarenai nemurenai toroimerai
Anata no miteru shoutai
Daremo yomenai karute
Fukashigi shiritai dake

[Verse 1]
Uso mo genjitsu mo
Docchi mo shinjitsu datta no hontou yo
Kyou mo hitorigoto
Nannimo muri wo shinaide watashi aisaretai
[Chorus]
Uyamuya sayonara karui memai
Anata no inai genshoukai
Daremo yomenai karute
Jiishiki afuredashite

[Piano solo]

[Verse 2]

Anata to nokosu koukai
Daremo yomenai karute
Fuyukai kurikaeshite

[Piano Solo]

[Bridge]
Tadashii yume wa kanashii koe wa
Utsukushii? utagawashii? urayamashii?
Nee, dore?

[Chorus]
Katarenai nemurenai toroimerai
Anata no miteru shoutai
Daremo yomenai karute
Fukashigi shiritai dake
Owaranai koto wa nai toroimerai
Anata to matagu kyoukai
Daremo yomenai karute
Shishunki kizuguchi mune no uchi
Fukashigi shiritai dake

[Chorus]
Katarenai nemurenai toroimerai
Anata no miteru shoutai
Daremo yomenai karute
Fukashigi shiritai dake

[Verse 1]
Uso mo genjitsu mo
Docchi mo shinjitsu datta no hontou yo
Kyou mo hitorigoto
Nannimo muri wo shinaide watashi aisaretai
[Chorus]
Uyamuya sayonara karui memai
Anata no inai genshoukai
Daremo yomenai karute
Jiishiki afuredashite

[Piano solo]

[Verse 2]
Kodou wo sekaizou wo
Itsumo kami awanai no itakute
Maiyo negaigoto
Nannimo utagawanaide mazari toke aitai

Tadashii yume wa kanashii koe wa
Utsukushii? utagawashii? urayamashii?
Nee, dore?

[Chorus]
Katarenai nemurenai toroimerai
Anata no miteru shoutai
Daremo yomenai karute
Fukashigi shiritai dake
Owaranai koto wa nai toroimerai
Anata to matagu kyoukai
Daremo yomenai karute
Shishunki kizuguchi mune no uchi
Fukashigi shiritai dake

[Chorus]
Katarenai nemurenai toroimerai
Anata no miteru shoutai
Daremo yomenai karute
Fukashigi shiritai dake

[Verse 1]
Uso mo genjitsu mo
Docchi mo shinjitsu datta no hontou yo
Kyou mo hitorigoto
Nannimo muri wo shinaide watashi aisaretai
[Chorus]
Uyamuya sayonara karui memai
Anata no inai genshoukai
Daremo yomenai karute
Jiishiki afuredashite

[Piano solo]

[Verse 2]
Kodou wo sekaizou wo
Itsumo kami awanai no itakute
Maiyo negaigoto
Nannimo utagawanaide mazari toke aitai

[Chorus]
Tawainai wakaranai riyuu sonzai
Anata to nokosu koukai
Daremo yomenai karute
Fuyukai kurikaeshite

Katarenai nemurenai toroimerai
Anata no miteru shoutai
Daremo yomenai karute
Fukashigi shiritai dake
Owaranai koto wa nai toroimerai
Anata to matagu kyoukai
Daremo yomenai karute
Shishunki kizuguchi mune no uchi
Fukashigi shiritai dake

[Chorus]
Katarenai nemurenai toroimerai
Anata no miteru shoutai
Daremo yomenai karute
Fukashigi shiritai dake

[Verse 1]
Uso mo genjitsu mo
Docchi mo shinjitsu datta no hontou yo
Kyou mo hitorigoto
Nannimo muri wo shinaide watashi aisaretai
[Chorus]
Uyamuya sayonara karui memai
Anata no inai genshoukai
Daremo yomenai karute
Jiishiki afuredashite

[Piano solo]

[Verse 2]
Kodou wo sekaizou wo
Itsumo kami awanai no itakute
Maiyo negaigoto
Nannimo utagawanaide mazari toke aitai

[Chorus]
Tawainai wakaranai riyuu sonzai
Anata to nokosu koukai
Daremo yomenai karute
Fuyukai kurikaeshite

[Piano Solo]

[Bridge]
Tadashii yume wa kanashii koe wa
Utsukushii? utagawashii? urayamashii?
Nee, dore?

Owaranai koto wa nai toroimerai
Anata to matagu kyoukai
Daremo yomenai karute
Shishunki kizuguchi mune no uchi
Fukashigi shiritai dake

[Chorus]
Katarenai nemurenai toroimerai
Anata no miteru shoutai
Daremo yomenai karute
Fukashigi shiritai dake

[Verse 1]
Uso mo genjitsu mo
Docchi mo shinjitsu datta no hontou yo
Kyou mo hitorigoto
Nannimo muri wo shinaide watashi aisaretai
[Chorus]
Uyamuya sayonara karui memai
Anata no inai genshoukai
Daremo yomenai karute
Jiishiki afuredashite

[Piano solo]

[Verse 2]
Kodou wo sekaizou wo
Itsumo kami awanai no itakute
Maiyo negaigoto
Nannimo utagawanaide mazari toke aitai

[Chorus]
Tawainai wakaranai riyuu sonzai
Anata to nokosu koukai
Daremo yomenai karute
Fuyukai kurikaeshite

[Piano Solo]

[Bridge]
Tadashii yume wa kanashii koe wa
Utsukushii? utagawashii? urayamashii?
Nee, dore?

Fukashigi shiritai dake

[Chorus]
Katarenai nemurenai toroimerai
Anata no miteru shoutai
Daremo yomenai karute
Fukashigi shiritai dake

[Verse 1]
Uso mo genjitsu mo
Docchi mo shinjitsu datta no hontou yo
Kyou mo hitorigoto
Nannimo muri wo shinaide watashi aisaretai
[Chorus]
Uyamuya sayonara karui memai
Anata no inai genshoukai
Daremo yomenai karute
Jiishiki afuredashite

[Piano solo]

[Verse 2]
Kodou wo sekaizou wo
Itsumo kami awanai no itakute
Maiyo negaigoto
Nannimo utagawanaide mazari toke aitai

[Chorus]
Tawainai wakaranai riyuu sonzai
Anata to nokosu koukai
Daremo yomenai karute
Fuyukai kurikaeshite

[Piano Solo]

[Bridge]
Tadashii yume wa kanashii koe wa
Utsukushii? utagawashii? urayamashii?
Nee, dore?

Daremo yomenai karute
Fukashigi shiritai dake

[Verse 1]
Uso mo genjitsu mo
Docchi mo shinjitsu datta no hontou yo
Kyou mo hitorigoto
Nannimo muri wo shinaide watashi aisaretai
[Chorus]
Uyamuya sayonara karui memai
Anata no inai genshoukai
Daremo yomenai karute
Jiishiki afuredashite

[Piano solo]

[Verse 2]
Kodou wo sekaizou wo
Itsumo kami awanai no itakute
Maiyo negaigoto
Nannimo utagawanaide mazari toke aitai

[Chorus]
Tawainai wakaranai riyuu sonzai
Anata to nokosu koukai
Daremo yomenai karute
Fuyukai kurikaeshite

[Piano Solo]

[Bridge]
Tadashii yume wa kanashii koe wa
Utsukushii? utagawashii? urayamashii?
Nee, dore?

[Chorus]
Katarenai nemurenai toroimerai
Anata no miteru shoutai
Daremo yomenai karute
Fukashigi shiritai dake
Owaranai koto wa nai toroimerai
Anata to matagu kyoukai
Daremo yomenai karute
Shishunki kizuguchi mune no uchi
Fukashigi shiritai dake

[Chorus]

Docchi mo shinjitsu datta no hontou yo
Kyou mo hitorigoto
Nannimo muri wo shinaide watashi aisaretai
[Chorus]
Uyamuya sayonara karui memai
Anata no inai genshoukai
Daremo yomenai karute
Jiishiki afuredashite

[Piano solo]

[Verse 2]
Kodou wo sekaizou wo
Itsumo kami awanai no itakute
Maiyo negaigoto
Nannimo utagawanaide mazari toke aitai

[Chorus]
Tawainai wakaranai riyuu sonzai
Anata to nokosu koukai
Daremo yomenai karute
Fuyukai kurikaeshite

[Piano Solo]

[Bridge]
Tadashii yume wa kanashii koe wa
Utsukushii? utagawashii? urayamashii?
Nee, dore?

[Chorus]
Katarenai nemurenai toroimerai
Anata no miteru shoutai
Daremo yomenai karute
Fukashigi shiritai dake
Owaranai koto wa nai toroimerai
Anata to matagu kyoukai
Daremo yomenai karute
Shishunki kizuguchi mune no uchi
Fukashigi shiritai dake

Uyamuya sayonara karui memai
Anata no inai genshoukai
Daremo yomenai karute
Jiishiki afuredashite

[Piano solo]

[Verse 2]
Kodou wo sekaizou wo
Itsumo kami awanai no itakute
Maiyo negaigoto
Nannimo utagawanaide mazari toke aitai

[Chorus]
Tawainai wakaranai riyuu sonzai
Anata to nokosu koukai
Daremo yomenai karute
Fuyukai kurikaeshite

[Piano Solo]

[Bridge]
Tadashii yume wa kanashii koe wa
Utsukushii? utagawashii? urayamashii?
Nee, dore?

[Chorus]
Katarenai nemurenai toroimerai
Anata no miteru shoutai
Daremo yomenai karute
Fukashigi shiritai dake
Owaranai koto wa nai toroimerai
Anata to matagu kyoukai
Daremo yomenai karute
Shishunki kizuguchi mune no uchi
Fukashigi shiritai dake

[Piano solo]

[Verse 2]
Kodou wo sekaizou wo
Itsumo kami awanai no itakute
Maiyo negaigoto
Nannimo utagawanaide mazari toke aitai

[Chorus]
Tawainai wakaranai riyuu sonzai
Anata to nokosu koukai
Daremo yomenai karute
Fuyukai kurikaeshite

[Piano Solo]

[Bridge]
Tadashii yume wa kanashii koe wa
Utsukushii? utagawashii? urayamashii?
Nee, dore?

[Chorus]
Katarenai nemurenai toroimerai
Anata no miteru shoutai
Daremo yomenai karute
Fukashigi shiritai dake
Owaranai koto wa nai toroimerai
Anata to matagu kyoukai
Daremo yomenai karute
Shishunki kizuguchi mune no uchi
Fukashigi shiritai dake

[Chorus]

Anata no miteru shoutai
Daremo yomenai karute
Fukashigi shiritai dake

[Verse 1]

Nannimo muri wo shinaide watashi aisaretai
[Chorus]
Uyamuya sayonara karui memai
Anata no inai genshoukai

Nannimo utagawanaide mazari toke aitai

[Chorus]
Tawainai wakaranai riyuu sonzai
Anata to nokosu koukai
Daremo yomenai karute
Fuyukai kurikaeshite

[Piano Solo]

[Bridge]
Tadashii yume wa kanashii koe wa
Utsukushii? utagawashii? urayamashii?
Nee, dore?

[Chorus]
Katarenai nemurenai toroimerai
Anata no miteru shoutai
Daremo yomenai karute
Fukashigi shiritai dake
Owaranai koto wa nai toroimerai
Anata to matagu kyoukai
Daremo yomenai karute
Shishunki kizuguchi mune no uchi
Fukashigi shiritai dake

[Chorus]
Katarenai nemurenai toroimerai
Anata no miteru shoutai
Daremo yomenai karute
Fukashigi shiritai dake

[Verse 1]
Uso mo genjitsu mo
Docchi mo shinjitsu datta no hontou yo
Kyou mo hitorigoto
Nannimo muri wo shinaide watashi aisaretai
[Chorus]
Uyamuya sayonara karui memai
Anata no inai genshoukai
Daremo yomenai karute
Jiishiki afuredashite

[Piano solo]

[Verse 2]

Anata to nokosu koukai
Daremo yomenai karute
Fuyukai kurikaeshite

[Piano Solo]

[Bridge]
Tadashii yume wa kanashii koe wa
Utsukushii? utagawashii? urayamashii?
Nee, dore?

[Chorus]
Katarenai nemurenai toroimerai
Anata no miteru shoutai
Daremo yomenai karute
Fukashigi shiritai dake
Owaranai koto wa nai toroimerai
Anata to matagu kyoukai
Daremo yomenai karute
Shishunki kizuguchi mune no uchi
Fukashigi shiritai dake

[Chorus]
Katarenai nemurenai toroimerai
Anata no miteru shoutai
Daremo yomenai karute
Fukashigi shiritai dake

[Verse 1]
Uso mo genjitsu mo
Docchi mo shinjitsu datta no hontou yo
Kyou mo hitorigoto
Nannimo muri wo shinaide watashi aisaretai
[Chorus]
Uyamuya sayonara karui memai
Anata no inai genshoukai
Daremo yomenai karute
Jiishiki afuredashite

[Piano solo]

[Verse 2]
Kodou wo sekaizou wo
Itsumo kami awanai no itakute
Maiyo negaigoto
Nannimo utagawanaide mazari toke aitai

Tadashii yume wa kanashii koe wa
Utsukushii? utagawashii? urayamashii?
Nee, dore?

[Chorus]
Katarenai nemurenai toroimerai
Anata no miteru shoutai
Daremo yomenai karute
Fukashigi shiritai dake
Owaranai koto wa nai toroimerai
Anata to matagu kyoukai
Daremo yomenai karute
Shishunki kizuguchi mune no uchi
Fukashigi shiritai dake

[Chorus]
Katarenai nemurenai toroimerai
Anata no miteru shoutai
Daremo yomenai karute
Fukashigi shiritai dake

[Verse 1]
Uso mo genjitsu mo
Docchi mo shinjitsu datta no hontou yo
Kyou mo hitorigoto
Nannimo muri wo shinaide watashi aisaretai
[Chorus]
Uyamuya sayonara karui memai
Anata no inai genshoukai
Daremo yomenai karute
Jiishiki afuredashite

[Piano solo]

[Verse 2]
Kodou wo sekaizou wo
Itsumo kami awanai no itakute
Maiyo negaigoto
Nannimo utagawanaide mazari toke aitai

[Chorus]
Tawainai wakaranai riyuu sonzai
Anata to nokosu koukai
Daremo yomenai karute
Fuyukai kurikaeshite

Katarenai nemurenai toroimerai
Anata no miteru shoutai
Daremo yomenai karute
Fukashigi shiritai dake
Owaranai koto wa nai toroimerai
Anata to matagu kyoukai
Daremo yomenai karute
Shishunki kizuguchi mune no uchi
Fukashigi shiritai dake

[Chorus]
Katarenai nemurenai toroimerai
Anata no miteru shoutai
Daremo yomenai karute
Fukashigi shiritai dake

[Verse 1]
Uso mo genjitsu mo
Docchi mo shinjitsu datta no hontou yo
Kyou mo hitorigoto
Nannimo muri wo shinaide watashi aisaretai
[Chorus]
Uyamuya sayonara karui memai
Anata no inai genshoukai
Daremo yomenai karute
Jiishiki afuredashite

[Piano solo]

[Verse 2]
Kodou wo sekaizou wo
Itsumo kami awanai no itakute
Maiyo negaigoto
Nannimo utagawanaide mazari toke aitai

[Chorus]
Tawainai wakaranai riyuu sonzai
Anata to nokosu koukai
Daremo yomenai karute
Fuyukai kurikaeshite

[Piano Solo]

[Bridge]
Tadashii yume wa kanashii koe wa
Utsukushii? utagawashii? urayamashii?
Nee, dore?

Owaranai koto wa nai toroimerai
Anata to matagu kyoukai
Daremo yomenai karute
Shishunki kizuguchi mune no uchi
Fukashigi shiritai dake

[Chorus]
Katarenai nemurenai toroimerai
Anata no miteru shoutai
Daremo yomenai karute
Fukashigi shiritai dake

[Verse 1]
Uso mo genjitsu mo
Docchi mo shinjitsu datta no hontou yo
Kyou mo hitorigoto
Nannimo muri wo shinaide watashi aisaretai
[Chorus]
Uyamuya sayonara karui memai
Anata no inai genshoukai
Daremo yomenai karute
Jiishiki afuredashite

[Piano solo]

[Verse 2]
Kodou wo sekaizou wo
Itsumo kami awanai no itakute
Maiyo negaigoto
Nannimo utagawanaide mazari toke aitai

[Chorus]
Tawainai wakaranai riyuu sonzai
Anata to nokosu koukai
Daremo yomenai karute
Fuyukai kurikaeshite

[Piano Solo]

[Bridge]
Tadashii yume wa kanashii koe wa
Utsukushii? utagawashii? urayamashii?
Nee, dore?

Fukashigi shiritai dake

[Chorus]
Katarenai nemurenai toroimerai
Anata no miteru shoutai
Daremo yomenai karute
Fukashigi shiritai dake

[Verse 1]
Uso mo genjitsu mo
Docchi mo shinjitsu datta no hontou yo
Kyou mo hitorigoto
Nannimo muri wo shinaide watashi aisaretai
[Chorus]
Uyamuya sayonara karui memai
Anata no inai genshoukai
Daremo yomenai karute
Jiishiki afuredashite

[Piano solo]

[Verse 2]
Kodou wo sekaizou wo
Itsumo kami awanai no itakute
Maiyo negaigoto
Nannimo utagawanaide mazari toke aitai

[Chorus]
Tawainai wakaranai riyuu sonzai
Anata to nokosu koukai
Daremo yomenai karute
Fuyukai kurikaeshite

[Piano Solo]

[Bridge]
Tadashii yume wa kanashii koe wa
Utsukushii? utagawashii? urayamashii?
Nee, dore?

Daremo yomenai karute
Fukashigi shiritai dake

[Verse 1]
Uso mo genjitsu mo
Docchi mo shinjitsu datta no hontou yo
Kyou mo hitorigoto
Nannimo muri wo shinaide watashi aisaretai
[Chorus]
Uyamuya sayonara karui memai
Anata no inai genshoukai
Daremo yomenai karute
Jiishiki afuredashite

[Piano solo]

[Verse 2]
Kodou wo sekaizou wo
Itsumo kami awanai no itakute
Maiyo negaigoto
Nannimo utagawanaide mazari toke aitai

[Chorus]
Tawainai wakaranai riyuu sonzai
Anata to nokosu koukai
Daremo yomenai karute
Fuyukai kurikaeshite

[Piano Solo]

[Bridge]
Tadashii yume wa kanashii koe wa
Utsukushii? utagawashii? urayamashii?
Nee, dore?

[Chorus]
Katarenai nemurenai toroimerai
Anata no miteru shoutai
Daremo yomenai karute
Fukashigi shiritai dake
Owaranai koto wa nai toroimerai
Anata to matagu kyoukai
Daremo yomenai karute
Shishunki kizuguchi mune no uchi
Fukashigi shiritai dake

[Chorus]

Docchi mo shinjitsu datta no hontou yo
Kyou mo hitorigoto
Nannimo muri wo shinaide watashi aisaretai
[Chorus]
Uyamuya sayonara karui memai
Anata no inai genshoukai
Daremo yomenai karute
Jiishiki afuredashite

[Piano solo]

[Verse 2]
Kodou wo sekaizou wo
Itsumo kami awanai no itakute
Maiyo negaigoto
Nannimo utagawanaide mazari toke aitai

[Chorus]
Tawainai wakaranai riyuu sonzai
Anata to nokosu koukai
Daremo yomenai karute
Fuyukai kurikaeshite

[Piano Solo]

[Bridge]
Tadashii yume wa kanashii koe wa
Utsukushii? utagawashii? urayamashii?
Nee, dore?

[Chorus]
Katarenai nemurenai toroimerai
Anata no miteru shoutai
Daremo yomenai karute
Fukashigi shiritai dake
Owaranai koto wa nai toroimerai
Anata to matagu kyoukai
Daremo yomenai karute
Shishunki kizuguchi mune no uchi
Fukashigi shiritai dake

Uyamuya sayonara karui memai
Anata no inai genshoukai
Daremo yomenai karute
Jiishiki afuredashite

[Piano solo]

[Verse 2]
Kodou wo sekaizou wo
Itsumo kami awanai no itakute
Maiyo negaigoto
Nannimo utagawanaide mazari toke aitai

[Chorus]
Tawainai wakaranai riyuu sonzai
Anata to nokosu koukai
Daremo yomenai karute
Fuyukai kurikaeshite

[Piano Solo]

[Bridge]
Tadashii yume wa kanashii koe wa
Utsukushii? utagawashii? urayamashii?
Nee, dore?

[Chorus]
Katarenai nemurenai toroimerai
Anata no miteru shoutai
Daremo yomenai karute
Fukashigi shiritai dake
Owaranai koto wa nai toroimerai
Anata to matagu kyoukai
Daremo yomenai karute
Shishunki kizuguchi mune no uchi
Fukashigi shiritai dake

[Piano solo]

[Verse 2]
Kodou wo sekaizou wo
Itsumo kami awanai no itakute
Maiyo negaigoto
Nannimo utagawanaide mazari toke aitai

[Chorus]
Tawainai wakaranai riyuu sonzai
Anata to nokosu koukai
Daremo yomenai karute
Fuyukai kurikaeshite

[Piano Solo]

[Bridge]
Tadashii yume wa kanashii koe wa
Utsukushii? utagawashii? urayamashii?
Nee, dore?

[Chorus]
Katarenai nemurenai toroimerai
Anata no miteru shoutai
Daremo yomenai karute
Fukashigi shiritai dake
Owaranai koto wa nai toroimerai
Anata to matagu kyoukai
Daremo yomenai karute
Shishunki kizuguchi mune no uchi
Fukashigi shiritai dake

[Chorus]

Anata no miteru shoutai
Daremo yomenai karute
Fukashigi shiritai dake

[Verse 1]

Nannimo muri wo shinaide watashi aisaretai
[Chorus]
Uyamuya sayonara karui memai
Anata no inai genshoukai

Nannimo utagawanaide mazari toke aitai

[Chorus]
Tawainai wakaranai riyuu sonzai
Anata to nokosu koukai
Daremo yomenai karute
Fuyukai kurikaeshite

[Piano Solo]

[Bridge]
Tadashii yume wa kanashii koe wa
Utsukushii? utagawashii? urayamashii?
Nee, dore?

[Chorus]
Katarenai nemurenai toroimerai
Anata no miteru shoutai
Daremo yomenai karute
Fukashigi shiritai dake
Owaranai koto wa nai toroimerai
Anata to matagu kyoukai
Daremo yomenai karute
Shishunki kizuguchi mune no uchi
Fukashigi shiritai dake

[Chorus]
Katarenai nemurenai toroimerai
Anata no miteru shoutai
Daremo yomenai karute
Fukashigi shiritai dake

[Verse 1]
Uso mo genjitsu mo
Docchi mo shinjitsu datta no hontou yo
Kyou mo hitorigoto
Nannimo muri wo shinaide watashi aisaretai
[Chorus]
Uyamuya sayonara karui memai
Anata no inai genshoukai
Daremo yomenai karute
Jiishiki afuredashite

[Piano solo]

[Verse 2]

Anata to nokosu koukai
Daremo yomenai karute
Fuyukai kurikaeshite

[Piano Solo]

[Bridge]
Tadashii yume wa kanashii koe wa
Utsukushii? utagawashii? urayamashii?
Nee, dore?

[Chorus]
Katarenai nemurenai toroimerai
Anata no miteru shoutai
Daremo yomenai karute
Fukashigi shiritai dake
Owaranai koto wa nai toroimerai
Anata to matagu kyoukai
Daremo yomenai karute
Shishunki kizuguchi mune no uchi
Fukashigi shiritai dake

[Chorus]
Katarenai nemurenai toroimerai
Anata no miteru shoutai
Daremo yomenai karute
Fukashigi shiritai dake

[Verse 1]
Uso mo genjitsu mo
Docchi mo shinjitsu datta no hontou yo
Kyou mo hitorigoto
Nannimo muri wo shinaide watashi aisaretai
[Chorus]
Uyamuya sayonara karui memai
Anata no inai genshoukai
Daremo yomenai karute
Jiishiki afuredashite

[Piano solo]

[Verse 2]
Kodou wo sekaizou wo
Itsumo kami awanai no itakute
Maiyo negaigoto
Nannimo utagawanaide mazari toke aitai

Tadashii yume wa kanashii koe wa
Utsukushii? utagawashii? urayamashii?
Nee, dore?

[Chorus]
Katarenai nemurenai toroimerai
Anata no miteru shoutai
Daremo yomenai karute
Fukashigi shiritai dake
Owaranai koto wa nai toroimerai
Anata to matagu kyoukai
Daremo yomenai karute
Shishunki kizuguchi mune no uchi
Fukashigi shiritai dake

[Chorus]
Katarenai nemurenai toroimerai
Anata no miteru shoutai
Daremo yomenai karute
Fukashigi shiritai dake

[Verse 1]
Uso mo genjitsu mo
Docchi mo shinjitsu datta no hontou yo
Kyou mo hitorigoto
Nannimo muri wo shinaide watashi aisaretai
[Chorus]
Uyamuya sayonara karui memai
Anata no inai genshoukai
Daremo yomenai karute
Jiishiki afuredashite

[Piano solo]

[Verse 2]
Kodou wo sekaizou wo
Itsumo kami awanai no itakute
Maiyo negaigoto
Nannimo utagawanaide mazari toke aitai

[Chorus]
Tawainai wakaranai riyuu sonzai
Anata to nokosu koukai
Daremo yomenai karute
Fuyukai kurikaeshite

Katarenai nemurenai toroimerai
Anata no miteru shoutai
Daremo yomenai karute
Fukashigi shiritai dake
Owaranai koto wa nai toroimerai
Anata to matagu kyoukai
Daremo yomenai karute
Shishunki kizuguchi mune no uchi
Fukashigi shiritai dake

[Chorus]
Katarenai nemurenai toroimerai
Anata no miteru shoutai
Daremo yomenai karute
Fukashigi shiritai dake

[Verse 1]
Uso mo genjitsu mo
Docchi mo shinjitsu datta no hontou yo
Kyou mo hitorigoto
Nannimo muri wo shinaide watashi aisaretai
[Chorus]
Uyamuya sayonara karui memai
Anata no inai genshoukai
Daremo yomenai karute
Jiishiki afuredashite

[Piano solo]

[Verse 2]
Kodou wo sekaizou wo
Itsumo kami awanai no itakute
Maiyo negaigoto
Nannimo utagawanaide mazari toke aitai

[Chorus]
Tawainai wakaranai riyuu sonzai
Anata to nokosu koukai
Daremo yomenai karute
Fuyukai kurikaeshite

[Piano Solo]

[Bridge]
Tadashii yume wa kanashii koe wa
Utsukushii? utagawashii? urayamashii?
Nee, dore?

Owaranai koto wa nai toroimerai
Anata to matagu kyoukai
Daremo yomenai karute
Shishunki kizuguchi mune no uchi
Fukashigi shiritai dake

[Chorus]
Katarenai nemurenai toroimerai
Anata no miteru shoutai
Daremo yomenai karute
Fukashigi shiritai dake

[Verse 1]
Uso mo genjitsu mo
Docchi mo shinjitsu datta no hontou yo
Kyou mo hitorigoto
Nannimo muri wo shinaide watashi aisaretai
[Chorus]
Uyamuya sayonara karui memai
Anata no inai genshoukai
Daremo yomenai karute
Jiishiki afuredashite

[Piano solo]

[Verse 2]
Kodou wo sekaizou wo
Itsumo kami awanai no itakute
Maiyo negaigoto
Nannimo utagawanaide mazari toke aitai

[Chorus]
Tawainai wakaranai riyuu sonzai
Anata to nokosu koukai
Daremo yomenai karute
Fuyukai kurikaeshite

[Piano Solo]

[Bridge]
Tadashii yume wa kanashii koe wa
Utsukushii? utagawashii? urayamashii?
Nee, dore?

Fukashigi shiritai dake

[Chorus]
Katarenai nemurenai toroimerai
Anata no miteru shoutai
Daremo yomenai karute
Fukashigi shiritai dake

[Verse 1]
Uso mo genjitsu mo
Docchi mo shinjitsu datta no hontou yo
Kyou mo hitorigoto
Nannimo muri wo shinaide watashi aisaretai
[Chorus]
Uyamuya sayonara karui memai
Anata no inai genshoukai
Daremo yomenai karute
Jiishiki afuredashite

[Piano solo]

[Verse 2]
Kodou wo sekaizou wo
Itsumo kami awanai no itakute
Maiyo negaigoto
Nannimo utagawanaide mazari toke aitai

[Chorus]
Tawainai wakaranai riyuu sonzai
Anata to nokosu koukai
Daremo yomenai karute
Fuyukai kurikaeshite

[Piano Solo]

[Bridge]
Tadashii yume wa kanashii koe wa
Utsukushii? utagawashii? urayamashii?
Nee, dore?

Daremo yomenai karute
Fukashigi shiritai dake

[Verse 1]
Uso mo genjitsu mo
Docchi mo shinjitsu datta no hontou yo
Kyou mo hitorigoto
Nannimo muri wo shinaide watashi aisaretai
[Chorus]
Uyamuya sayonara karui memai
Anata no inai genshoukai
Daremo yomenai karute
Jiishiki afuredashite

[Piano solo]

[Verse 2]
Kodou wo sekaizou wo
Itsumo kami awanai no itakute
Maiyo negaigoto
Nannimo utagawanaide mazari toke aitai

[Chorus]
Tawainai wakaranai riyuu sonzai
Anata to nokosu koukai
Daremo yomenai karute
Fuyukai kurikaeshite

[Piano Solo]

[Bridge]
Tadashii yume wa kanashii koe wa
Utsukushii? utagawashii? urayamashii?
Nee, dore?

[Chorus]
Katarenai nemurenai toroimerai
Anata no miteru shoutai
Daremo yomenai karute
Fukashigi shiritai dake
Owaranai koto wa nai toroimerai
Anata to matagu kyoukai
Daremo yomenai karute
Shishunki kizuguchi mune no uchi
Fukashigi shiritai dake

[Chorus]

Docchi mo shinjitsu datta no hontou yo
Kyou mo hitorigoto
Nannimo muri wo shinaide watashi aisaretai
[Chorus]
Uyamuya sayonara karui memai
Anata no inai genshoukai
Daremo yomenai karute
Jiishiki afuredashite

[Piano solo]

[Verse 2]
Kodou wo sekaizou wo
Itsumo kami awanai no itakute
Maiyo negaigoto
Nannimo utagawanaide mazari toke aitai

[Chorus]
Tawainai wakaranai riyuu sonzai
Anata to nokosu koukai
Daremo yomenai karute
Fuyukai kurikaeshite

[Piano Solo]

[Bridge]
Tadashii yume wa kanashii koe wa
Utsukushii? utagawashii? urayamashii?
Nee, dore?

[Chorus]
Katarenai nemurenai toroimerai
Anata no miteru shoutai
Daremo yomenai karute
Fukashigi shiritai dake
Owaranai koto wa nai toroimerai
Anata to matagu kyoukai
Daremo yomenai karute
Shishunki kizuguchi mune no uchi
Fukashigi shiritai dake

Uyamuya sayonara karui memai
Anata no inai genshoukai
Daremo yomenai karute
Jiishiki afuredashite

[Piano solo]

[Verse 2]
Kodou wo sekaizou wo
Itsumo kami awanai no itakute
Maiyo negaigoto
Nannimo utagawanaide mazari toke aitai

[Chorus]
Tawainai wakaranai riyuu sonzai
Anata to nokosu koukai
Daremo yomenai karute
Fuyukai kurikaeshite

[Piano Solo]

[Bridge]
Tadashii yume wa kanashii koe wa
Utsukushii? utagawashii? urayamashii?
Nee, dore?

[Chorus]
Katarenai nemurenai toroimerai
Anata no miteru shoutai
Daremo yomenai karute
Fukashigi shiritai dake
Owaranai koto wa nai toroimerai
Anata to matagu kyoukai
Daremo yomenai karute
Shishunki kizuguchi mune no uchi
Fukashigi shiritai dake

[Piano solo]

[Verse 2]
Kodou wo sekaizou wo
Itsumo kami awanai no itakute
Maiyo negaigoto
Nannimo utagawanaide mazari toke aitai

[Chorus]
Tawainai wakaranai riyuu sonzai
Anata to nokosu koukai
Daremo yomenai karute
Fuyukai kurikaeshite

[Piano Solo]

[Bridge]
Tadashii yume wa kanashii koe wa
Utsukushii? utagawashii? urayamashii?
Nee, dore?

[Chorus]
Katarenai nemurenai toroimerai
Anata no miteru shoutai
Daremo yomenai karute
Fukashigi shiritai dake
Owaranai koto wa nai toroimerai
Anata to matagu kyoukai
Daremo yomenai karute
Shishunki kizuguchi mune no uchi
Fukashigi shiritai dake

[Chorus]

Anata no miteru shoutai
Daremo yomenai karute
Fukashigi shiritai dake

[Verse 1]

Nannimo muri wo shinaide watashi aisaretai
[Chorus]
Uyamuya sayonara karui memai
Anata no inai genshoukai

Nannimo utagawanaide mazari toke aitai

[Chorus]
Tawainai wakaranai riyuu sonzai
Anata to nokosu koukai
Daremo yomenai karute
Fuyukai kurikaeshite

[Piano Solo]

[Bridge]
Tadashii yume wa kanashii koe wa
Utsukushii? utagawashii? urayamashii?
Nee, dore?

[Chorus]
Katarenai nemurenai toroimerai
Anata no miteru shoutai
Daremo yomenai karute
Fukashigi shiritai dake
Owaranai koto wa nai toroimerai
Anata to matagu kyoukai
Daremo yomenai karute
Shishunki kizuguchi mune no uchi
Fukashigi shiritai dake

[Chorus]
Katarenai nemurenai toroimerai
Anata no miteru shoutai
Daremo yomenai karute
Fukashigi shiritai dake

[Verse 1]
Uso mo genjitsu mo
Docchi mo shinjitsu datta no hontou yo
Kyou mo hitorigoto
Nannimo muri wo shinaide watashi aisaretai
[Chorus]
Uyamuya sayonara karui memai
Anata no inai genshoukai
Daremo yomenai karute
Jiishiki afuredashite

[Piano solo]

[Verse 2]
Kodou wo sekaizou wo
